author: jimmygchen
content:
ah ok, as in always pull latest?

The problem is `ethereum-package` itself at a specific commit is compatible with specific versions of the tooling (e.g. dora in this case).

so if I pin `ethereum-package` to v4.2.0 and pull latest image, it would not be compatible.

author: barnabasbusa
